name: Patient Apocalypse
description:
THIS IS MY FIRST GAME I EVER MADE. THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR GODOT WILD JAM #53.

 IN THIS GAME YOU ARE A DOCTOR. YOU CAN THROW INJECTION ON  PATIENTS.YOU HAVE TO THROW TWO TIMES INJECTION TO HEAL A PATIENT. IF YOU GET  IN CONTACT OF A PATIENT, THEN YOU WILL GET INFECTED. YOUR TEMPERATURE WILL INCREASE  BY 25 WHICH YOU CAN SEE IN THE THERMOMETER. YOU CAN COOL DOWN YOUR TEMPERATURE BY HEALING THE PATIENT BY 5. IF THE THERMOMETER REACHED IT'S MAXIMUM LIMIT THEN YOUR GAME WILL BE OVER. 

                             NOW ENJOY :)

 GODOT WILD JAM #53 TOPIC AND WILDCARS USAGE 

TOPIC - ASSEMBLY REQUIRED - IN THIS GAME PATIENTS ARE THE ASSEMBLY.

WILD CARDS -

1) FOUR COLOURS - RED , BLUE , PEACH , GREY 

2) TEMPERATURE AS GAME MECHANICS - THE THERMOMETER IS THE TEMPERATURE, IF YOUR TEMPERATURE IS HIGH THEN YOU WILL LOSE THE GAME.

IF THE PATIENTS GET NEAR YOU, YOUR TEMPERATURE WILL INCREASE BY 25 AND IF YOU HEAL A PATIENT, YOUR TEMPERATURE WILL DECREASE BY 5.
